definition: the act of flexing, cause (a plastic object) to assume a crooked or angular form
details:
noun
- the act of flexing
= example: the act of flexing
verb
- cause (a plastic object) to assume a crooked or angular form
= synonyms: twist
- bend a joint
= example: bend a joint
- form a curve
= synonyms: bend
- contract
= example: contract
= synonyms: catch
- exhibit the strength of
= example: exhibit the strength of
